UI_visible_response: The exact reason for Qin Gang's dismissal as China's foreign minister was not officially provided. He was removed from his position in July 2023 after a one-month absence, during which he made his last public appearance on June 25, 20231. His removal was noted as unique due to his short term of service and the significant international attention it garnered2. Despite various speculations, no official explanation has been given for his dismissal4.
traffic_visible_response: The exact reason for Qin Gang's dismissal as China's foreign minister was not officially provided. He was removed from his position in July 2023 after a one-month absence, during which he made his last public appearance on June 25, 2023 [[1]]. His removal was noted as unique due to his short term of service and the significant international attention it garnered [[2]]. Despite various speculations, no official explanation has been given for his dismissal [[4]].
